main event: On November 24, 1960, a light blue object was sighted traveling from the NNE to the E, disappearing in about 6 seconds.
interesting points: The object was described as light blue and moved quickly, disappearing within seconds., The sighting was made visually from the ground., There was no prior experience of witnessing a similar phenomenon., The report concludes that it may have been a meteor., The sighting was documented in a Project Blue Book report.
witness description: The witness did not report experiencing similar phenomena before.
